title: 97/390/EC: Council Decision of 17 June 1997 authorizing the Portuguese Republic to extend until 7 March 1998 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 17 June 1997 authorizing the Portuguese Republic to extend until 7 March 1998 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa (97/390/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The Portuguese Republic is hereby authorized to extend until 7 March 1998 the Agreement on mutual fishery relations with the Republic of South Africa which entered into force on 9 April 1979.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 17 June 1997.
For the Council
The President
A. JORRITSMA-LEBBINK
(1) OJ No L 196, 7. 8. 1996, p. 12.
